engineArguments.description: Command line arguments passed to the CLI training tool

groundTruthBag.description: A bag of line ground truth adhering to https://ocr-d.github.io/gt-profile.json

groundTruthGlob.description: Wildcard for matching only a subset of the ground truth files. Make sure to exclude extensions and end in '*'.

outputModelFormat.description: The output format of the model. Note that individual engines only support a single one or a subset of formats.

evalRatio.description: Ratio of evaluation vs. training data to divide up ground truth

randomSeed.description: Seed for the random number generator shuffling the ground truth before dividing it into evaluation vs. training data
